Changed so that broken rings do not appear from treasure chests of 5 LV or more
Items improvements
Increase the rarity limit for some items.
Cloaks and swords that can be bought in the shop will appear up to +5 if you don't have them, but this has been applied up to the current level of rarity.

The probability of treasure chests is now up to 1.6 times higher than in the early versions!

The lower limit of rarity for items appearing from Treasure Chest LV has been set.
Skills are at a maximum of -1.
Items are a maximum of -2.

Enemy red attacks have been greatly mitigated!
